## Processing Data

### Loading required libraries

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```


### Loading data

```{r load_data, cache=TRUE}
download.file(
    "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2",
    destfile = "storm-data.csv.bz2"
)
raw_storms_data <- read.csv("storm-data.csv.bz2") %>% as_tibble()
```
